knimeNode.name: Envelope Function
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates the upper envelope function for another function.

intro.p: This node takes an input table with a numeric input column. It calculates the upper envelope curve for that input column and returns a new table containing only the rows forming the envelope curve.

fullDescription.option: Choose the input column containing the input function.

ports.inPort: A table with at least one double compatible column serving as the input signal.
ports.outPort: A table with all rows that are not part of the envelope function filtered out.
